entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 08:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
